function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased social interaction during livestream commerce may lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Unmitigated, this could result in the spread of contagious diseases among participating individuals.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for all participants and utilize technology to limit physical contact.","Technologies":"Livestream platforms with built-in chat and interaction features, virtual reality for remote product interaction.","People":"Consumers, salespeople, online chat moderators, and any other participants in livestream commerce.","Owner":"Livestream platform operators, e-commerce companies, and event organizers."},{"Description":"Use of virtual conversational agents and avatars in e-commerce may create a false sense of security regarding disease transmission.","Impact":"Without proper precautions, this may lead to reduced adherence to health and safety guidelines, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidance on health and safety measures, and continuously educate users about the limitations of virtual interactions.","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence for health and safety communication, virtual reality for simulated training scenarios.","People":"Consumers, e-commerce companies, and developers of virtual agents.","Owner":"Health authorities, e-commerce companies, and developers of virtual agents."},{"Description":"Integration of voice assistant technology in cooking apps may lead to cross-contamination of devices in the kitchen.","Impact":"Cross-contamination could lead to the spread of foodborne illnesses and other contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Promote the use of voice command devices with touchless activation and regularly sanitize devices used in cooking environments.","Technologies":"Touchless voice command activation, voice recognition for personalized user profiles.","People":"Consumers using voice assistant technology in cooking, app developers, and kitchen appliance manufacturers.","Owner":"App developers, kitchen appliance manufacturers, and public health organizations."}]}
